info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 8:34PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern El Paso County through 915 PM MDT... At 834 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Peyton, or 26 miles northeast of Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and brief rounds of up to half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Calhan, Schriever AFB, Ellicott, Peyton and Falcon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
